name: Invoice - Send to customer
subject: Your invoice : ${object.number or 'n/a' }
body_html:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Please find enclosed the invoice relating to following order : ${object.origin or 'n/a' }

Thank you for confidence.

 

The Accounting Team

senseFly

name: Last reminder - Send to customer
subject: OVERDUE: ${object.number or 'n/a' }
body_html:
Dear customer,

This is to inform you that the attached invoice is overdue.

We would appreciate if you could remit the full amount due within the next 7 days. If we do not receive your payment within this delay, your account will be put on hold and we will not be able to proceed with new orders.

If you have any questions about the balance due on your account, please contact us by email at finance@sensefly.com.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.


Sincerely,
The Accounting Team
